name: Derrick Stewart
text:
This is a biggy because I don't just give out 5 stars.  This place has a lot of positives and few to any negatives. They allow coolers, I always point this out even if it is a given. The bathrooms were really clean and I mean cleaned HOURLY. The park has brand new fields and facility. The parking lot was convenient. The seating arrangement was great, there was plenty of room for people who brought their own chairs and tent to set up shop. Even though this place is off the beaten path for us it is in an ideal location to play team's we normally wouldn't play.Living in extreme North Alabama, it seems to have potential to draw team's from Tuscaloosa and western Mississippi(it's always a plus to see action from new teams).

The only knock I can muster is they could provide a little more shade in areas away from the press box.

In summary, I would highly advise and recommend that if you have a chance to play in a tournament at this park to do it. Great experience guarenteed.

name: Henry Howard
text: Small but really nice and very well kept! Concessions and bathrooms were also very nice and were kept well stocked. Everyone working the tournament was very courteous and went out of there way to be helpful. I hope we play more tournaments here in the future.
